GSD.product_version: versions from v5.4 to before v6.0
GSD.description:
net/sched: taprio: avoid disabling offload when it was never enabled

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0 by commit db46e3a88a09c5cf7e505664d01da7238cd56c92, it was introduced in version v5.4 by commit 9c66d15646760eb8982242b4531c4d4fd36118fd. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net/sched: taprio: avoid disabling offload when it was never enabled
